ZIP Package Library License Agreement

Copyright (C) 1998 Gilles Vollant

This unzip package allow creates .ZIP file, compatible with PKZip 2.04g WinZip, InfoZip tools and compatible. Multi volume ZipFile (span) are not supported. Old compressions used by old PKZip 1.x are not supported

For uncompress .zip file, look at unzip.h

Condition of use and distribution are the same than zlib :
